document_data.name: ''Ring of Gaki-Protection''
document_data.mainbody: A '''ring of gaki-protection''' was a [[magic item]] that could be found within the [[Rainbow Monastery]] in the [[Hordelands]].
document_data.Description: This item was a plain [[silver]] ring.
document_data.Powers: When worn by a [[priest]], this ring allowed the wearer to [[Turn undead|turn]] all kinds of vile [[gaki]] as if they were [[undead]].
